BookFile.Header:
Entry format
AJB_ID volume.section[(subsection)].entry, for example 68.144(1).25 would be volume 68, section 144, subsection 1, and entry number 25.
Save as Unicode UTF-8 text encoding. Skip section 2 in Part 1
